item.description:
Okay now.....More than a few members have raved about this Oyama. So I figured we'd try it out in the new year. I realize it is slightly short notice.....my schedule is a little crazy and I have my Jan. weekends all locked up. So we'll see what happenes.....Happy new year to all you sushi addicts......

Chris MACCIO

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: New Year Sushi.....
